      • isValidDB

        public boolean isValidDB(Settings newSettings)
        Asserts that the inputed database is valid
        Parameters:
        newSettings - Settings object containing database to verify
        Returns:
        True if database is valid, false if database is invalid

      • writeSettings

        public boolean writeSettings(Settings newSettings)
        Stores settings using the Properties class and writes them to a local file
        Parameters:
        newSettings - Settings object containing all settings to be stored
        Returns:
        True if writing to the file was successful, false if it was not successful
